product_families.family_name: Armoured Polythene Insulated Jelly Filled (PIJF) Copper Cables

constraints: Conductor: Solid Annealed high conductive Copper, 0.5mm diameter
Insulation: Polythene (ASTMD-1248 Type-II or III, Class-A cat.4 or 5)
Armouring: Galvanized steel tape, Helical (double), 0.5mm ±10% thickness
Moisture Barrier: Polythene coated aluminum tape, 0.3 mm+15% thickness, min 3mm overlap
Min Sheath Thickness: 75% of nominal specified (1.62mm min, 2.0mm nom)
Marking: Sequential length marking on sheath at 1m intervals is critical
Packing: Wooden drums with sealed ends
special_compliance: Colour coding as per TEC GR/CUG-01/03 Aug 2003, Table 2
Local content certification required (Class-I or Class-II)

constraints: Conductor: Solid Annealed high conductive Copper, 0.5mm diameter
Insulation: Polythene (ASTMD-1248 Type-II or III, Class-A cat.4 or 5)
Armouring: Galvanized steel tape, Helical (double), 0.5mm ±10% thickness
Moisture Barrier: Polythene coated aluminum tape, 0.3 mm+15% thickness, min 3mm overlap
Min Sheath Thickness: 75% of nominal specified (1.50mm min, 2.0mm nom)
Marking: Sequential length marking on sheath at 1m intervals is critical
Packing: Wooden drums with sealed ends

constraints: Conductor: Solid annealed Bare copper, 0.5mm diameter
Armouring: Galvanized Steel Round wire (IS:3975), single layer, ≥ 0.9mm size
Inner Sheath: PVC type 'TM-2' (IS:13176) or ST1 (IS:5831), min 0.65mm thickness
Outer Sheath: Extruded FRLS PVC type- TM-2 (IS:13176) or ST1 (IS:5831), min 1.24mm thickness
Packing Length: 500 meters ±10% or as per TEC GR
Packing: Drums/reels with markings as per TEC GR
special_compliance: Local content certification required (Class-I or Class-II)

non_negotiable_constraints: Conductor Material: Solid Annealed high conductive Copper
Conductor Diameter: 0.5mm
Armouring Type: Galvanized steel tape (PIJF) or Galvanized Steel Round wire (FRLS)
Filling Compound (PIJF): Petroleum Jelly
Moisture Barrier (PIJF): Polythene coated aluminum tape, min 3mm overlap
Sheath Material (PIJF): Polythene (BS 6234)
Jacket Material (PIJF): Solid polythene (BS-6234)
Sheath Material (FRLS): FRLS PVC type- TM-2 (IS:13176) or ST1 (IS:5831)
Inner Sheath Material (FRLS): PVC type 'TM-2' (IS:13176) or ST1 (IS:5831)
Marking: Sequential length marking on sheath at 1m intervals is critical for PIJF cables
Packing: Wooden drums for PIJF cables
Minimum Sheath Thickness (PIJF): 75% of nominal specified (min 1.50mm for 10-100 pair, 1.62mm for 200 pair)
Minimum Jacket Thickness (PIJF): 1.4mm
Armouring Thickness (PIJF): 0.5mm ±10%
Conductor Resistance: 86 Ohms/ km ± 6 Ohms/ km
Mutual Capacitance (PIJF): 52 ± 3 nF/km
Capacitance Unbalance (Pair to Pair) (PIJF): ≤ 50 pF/Km (average)
Insulation Resistance (PIJF): Min 5000 MΩ-KM
High Voltage Test (PIJF): 2.4 KV DC (conductor-to-conductor), 5.0 KV DC (conductor-to-shield) for 3 Sec.
FRLS Flammability Test: IEC-332 Part-1
FRLS Smoke Density Rating: ASTM D2843
special_compliance_or_process_requiremen: Pre-delivery inspection required at factory site or via online video mode.
Dispatch only after clearance from Pre-Delivery inspection team.
Random sampling for testing; minimum 50% of ordered quantity to be tested in presence of authorities.
Local content certification required (Class-I or Class-II).
For bids > Rs. 10 Cr., local content percentage certificate required.
OEM certificate of authorization as dealer/agent.
OEM affidavit on manufacturing existence for at least 5 years.
OEM affidavit on not supplying 3rd party blacklisted equipment.
Supplier must have prior experience supplying similar items.
Firm must be in existence for minimum four years.
Full payment after receipt and acceptance of materials.
Penalty of 0.5% per week for delayed delivery, capped at 10% of contract value.
Minimum one year warranty from date of acceptance.
technical_risk_flags: Critical sequential length marking on PIJF cables.
Strict adherence to specified test parameters for electrical and mechanical properties.
FRLS properties testing (flammability, smoke density) are critical.
